          <title>
            <string language="en">Head-on collision of two trolleys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belegungszusammenstoß von zwei Laufkatzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collision frontale de deux chariots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colisão head-on de dois troles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno scontro head-on di due carrelli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετωπική σύγκρουση δύο καροτσακιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colisión de frente de dos carretillas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows two different situations of two trolleys before and after a head-on collision, with their masses and velocities indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conservation of momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elastic collisions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">head-on collisions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trolleys</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei unterschiedlichen 
Situationen von zwei Laufkatzen vorher und nachher einen 
Belegungszusammenstoß, wenn ihren Massen und Geschwindigkeiten 
angezeigt sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à deux situations 
différentes de deux chariots avant et après une collision frontale, avec
les leurs masses et vitesses indiquées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a duas situações 
diferentes de dois troles before.and.after uma colisão head-on, com 
suas massas e velocidades indicadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra a due situazioni 
differenti di due carrelli prima e dopo uno scontro head-on, con le 
loro masse e velocità indicate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο διαφορετικές 
καταστάσεις δύο καροτσακιών πριν και μετά από μια μετωπική 
σύγκρουση, με τις μάζες και τις ταχύτητές τους που 
υποδεικνύονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a dos diversas 
situaciones de dos carretillas antes y después una colisión de 
frente, con sus masas y velocidades indicadas.</string>
          </description>
